articles.description: Cracker Barrel and Dolly Parton have teamed up for a special VIP package contest in light of her appearance in the Macy’s Thanksgiving Parade.
articles.content:
KNOXVILLE, Tenn. (WVLT) - Cracker Barrel and Dolly Parton have teamed up for a special VIP package contest in light of her appearance in the Macys Thanksgiving Parade.

articles.title: Freaky Is the Sweetest Body-Swap Slasher Comedy You’ll See This Year - Vulture
articles.description: The new film from Vince Vaughn and Kathryn Newton is clever about horror conventions, but its biggest surprise is its streak of sincerity.
articles.content: The Blissfield Butcher (Vince Vaughn) is a killer in the Michael Myers mold wears a mask, improbably strong, not much for talking, slow-but-inexorable style. His victims, at least at the start, are t… [+5019 chars]

articles.author: By James Gordon For Dailymail.com
articles.title: Alex Trebek's widow, Jean, shares a photo from the couple's wedding day in 1990 thanking fans - Daily Mail
articles.description: Alex Trebek's widow, Jean, has shared a picture from the couple's wedding day in 1990. The photo shows him sliding a wedding ring onto his wife's finger. The pair had been married for 30 years.
articles.content:
The widow of Jeopardy! host Alex Trebek has shared a photo from the couple's wedding 30 years ago.
